snippet: Andre Iguodala sank the winning free throws and finished with 20 points as the Philadelphia 76ers ousted the Chicago Bulls in six games.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Philadelphia 76ers defeat Chicago Bulls, 79-78, in Game 6 to win the series, 4-2, and eliminate the battered Bulls from the playoffs; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Andre Iguodala sank the winning free throws and finished with 20 points as the Philadelphia 76ers ousted the Chicago Bulls in six games.

headline.seo: Sixers Finish Off a First-Round Upset
headline.main: Sixers Finish Off an Upset of the Battered Bulls
headline.print_headline: Sixers Finish Off an Upset of the Battered Bulls
